mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TASK_POND_MES ( ID, INSIDE_ORDER, PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, AMOUNT, PLAN_STARTDATE, PLAN_HOURS, PRICE, STATUS, DESC, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insideOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{planStartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{planHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_TASK_POND_MES.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE TASK_POND_MES
INSIDE_ORDER = #{insideOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLAN_STARTDATE = #{planStartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLAN_HOURS = #{planHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: SELECT ID id, INSIDE_ORDER insideOrder, PROD_NO prodNo, CRAFWORK_ID crafworkId, AMOUNT amount, PLAN_STARTDATE planStartdate, PLAN_HOURS planHours, PRICE price, STATUS status, DESC desc, DELETED deleted, COMPANY_ID companyId, CREATE_TIME createTime, CREATE_BY createBy, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, MODIFY_BY modifyBy
